Definition.WordDefinition: scallywag n 1: white Southerner supporting Reconstruction policies after the Civil War usually for self-interest [syn: {scalawag}] 2: a deceitful and unreliable scoundrel [syn: {rogue}, {knave}, {rascal}, {rapscallion}, {scalawag}, {varlet}] 3: one who is playfully mischievous [syn: {imp}, {scamp}, {monkey}, {rascal}, {rapscallion}, {scalawag}]
